problems.title: Even or Odd
problems.description: Determine if a number N is even or odd.
problems.explanation: A number is even if it is divisible by 2 (N % 2 == 0), otherwise it is odd.

problems.title: Largest of Three
problems.description: Take three space-separated integers and print the largest one.
problems.explanation: Compare the three numbers using nested if-statements or logical AND operators: `if (a >= b && a >= c)`. In Python, `max(a, b, c)` is a quick way.

starter_codes.python:
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(max(a, b, c))

problems.title: Grading System
problems.description: Read marks M (0-100) and print grade: 90+ 'A', 80-89 'B', 70-79 'C', else 'F'.
problems.explanation: Use `if-else if-else` structure to check marks against different thresholds sequentially.

problems.title: Leap Year
problems.description: Check if a year Y is a leap year. Output 'Leap' or 'Not Leap'.
problems.explanation: A year is a leap year if it's divisible by 400 OR (divisible by 4 AND not divisible by 100).
